monster.name: Ascended Archon
monster.languages: Primordial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 10 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Arcana + PB, History + PB, Religion + PB

trait.name: Astral Step
trait.text: When the Archon casts a Vessel spell of 1st-level or higher, it can instantly teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Sorcerous Mantle
trait.text: When the Archon takes damage from a spell, it can use its reaction to halve any damage that it would have taken from that spell.

action.name: Arcane Blast
action.text: As an action, the Archon can choose a point it can see within 60 feet and force all creatures within 5 feet of that point to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, creatures take damage as if they had been hit by an Iridescent Strike attack.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 5 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Air Archon
monster.languages: Auran, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 10 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Acrobatics + PB, Nature + PB

trait.name: Air Form
trait.text: The Archon can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing, and it does not provoke opportunity attacks while it is flying.

trait.name: Bluster
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon hits a target with an Iridescent Strike, it can force it to make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it is pushed away from you in a straight line up to 15 feet. Any creature that is more than one size larger than the Archon has advantage on its Strength saving throw.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Fire Archon
monster.languages: Ignan, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Nature + PB, Intimidation + PB

trait.name: Ignite
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon hits a target with an Iridescent Strike, it can choose to light the target on fire, if it is flammable. The target must then make a Dexterity saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a failed save, it takes damage as if hit by another Iridescent Strike. On a success, the flames are extinguished and it takes no additional damage.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The Archon sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 ft.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Earth Archon
monster.languages: Terran, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 15 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Nature + PB, Survival + PB

trait.name: Rock Solid
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon hits a creature with an Iridescent Strike it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, its speed is halved until the start of your next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The Archon's Iridescent Strikes deal the maximum possible damage against nonmagical objects and structures instead of rolling.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Water Archon
monster.languages: Aquan, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Medicine + PB, Nature + PB

trait.name: Aqueous
trait.text: The Archon can breathe normally in air and water, and it can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Watery Resilience
trait.text: When the Archon takes damage, it can use its reaction to reduce the damage by an amount equal to your Charisma modifier and move up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 7 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Cursed Archon
monster.languages: Infernal, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Religion + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Infernal Drain
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon hits a creature with an Iridescent Strike, its temporary hit points are increased by an amount equal to half the damage dealt. This has no effect on undead targets.

trait.name: Savage Strikes
trait.text: When the Archon uses its action to make an Iridescent Strike, it can make one additional Iridescent Strike attack as part of that same action.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 8 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Fallen Archon
monster.languages: Celestial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 14 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Intimidation + PB, Religion + PB

trait.name: Celestial Ward
trait.text: As a bonus action on its turn, the Archon can grant one target other than itself, that it can see within 30 feet temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

trait.name: Radiant Ward
trait.text: Once per turn when the Archon makes a Blade of Judgment attack, it can cause the damage dice of that weapon to become 2d6. If the target is a fiend or undead it deals an additional 1d6 damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 10 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Formless Archon
monster.languages: Primordial, and any languages you know

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + your Charisma modifier

trait.name: Skills
trait.text: Deception + PB, Stealth + PB

trait.name: Pseudopod
trait.text: The Archon has a number of additional pseudopods equal to your Constitution modifier. These pseudopods can only make Iridescent Strikes, and have a reach of 10 feet. Attacks can target these pseudopod limbs to attack the Archon directly.

trait.name: Sticky Slime
trait.text: When the Archon hits a creature that is equal to its size or smaller with an Iridescent Strike using one of its psuedopods, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be grappled. As an action, a grappled creature can make a Strength saving throw, escaping on a success. If a pseudopod is grappling a creature it cannot be used to make Iridescent Strikes.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Vessel v2.2.0 p. 11 (Homebrew)
